com.samskivert.depot.annotation

Annotation Type Transform


  • @Target(value={TYPE,FIELD})
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Inherited
public @interface Transform
    Declares that the target of this annotation, either a field in a PersistentRecord or a type (which will eventually be stored in a persistent record), should be transformed before saving to the database and after loading from the database.

    For example, one may choose to transform a particular persistent record field into a type supported directly by Depot:

     public class MyRecord extends PersistentRecord {
     @Transform(Transformers.StringArray.class)
     public String[] cities;
 }

    or one may opt to specify a transformation for all fields that contain a value of a particular type:

     @Transform(ByteEnumTransformer.class)
 public interface ByteEnum { ... }

    Note that because Depot honors @Transform annotations on any interface implemented by a type, or on a type's superclass, it is possible that conflicting transformations may be specified. In this case, Depot will fail with a runtime error during initialization, to indicate the problem.

    See Also:
    Transformer

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      Class<? extends Transformer> value
      Specifies a transformer to be used when persisting the target of this annotation.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      boolean immutable
      Hint to the transformer whether it should return an immutable result.
      boolean intern
      Hint to the transformer whether it should return an interned result, which should only be honored if the result is also immutable.

    • Element Detail

      • value

        public abstract Class<? extends Transformer> value
        Specifies a transformer to be used when persisting the target of this annotation.

      • immutable

        public abstract boolean immutable
        Hint to the transformer whether it should return an immutable result. The transformer is free to ignore this hint.
        Default:
        false

      • intern

        public abstract boolean intern
        Hint to the transformer whether it should return an interned result, which should only be honored if the result is also immutable. The transformer is free to ignore this hint.
        Default:
        false
